mapper.select: SELECT u.name as user_name, p.title as point_title, p.point as point_point, ph.user_id, ph.point_id, ph.created_at FROM pointhistory ph, users u, point p WHERE ph.user_id = u.id AND ph.point_id = p.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pointhistory (user_id, point_id, created_at) SELECT #{user_id}, #{point_id}, SYSDATE FROM dual WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE id = #{user_id}) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM point WHERE id = #{point_id})
